about_the_game:
Skins change the look and feel of a ruleset to match a specific theme.

This skin uses a theme appropriate for a modern setting.

Skin created by Kevin Doswell

Released on December 04, 2010. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 2.9.9 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds ruleset.
